Sta. MAU.080 Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin, 20°02'N 17°26'W, depth 60-70 m, gastropods, hermitcrabs (partly with Suberites), portunids, spider crabs, galateids, flat- fish, Capros, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 14.vi.1988.

Sta. MAU.071 Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin, 20°00'N 17°21'W, depth 43 m, muddy s with tubeworms, crabs (Calappa, Dromia, portunids), Scyllarus, ophiurids, flatfish (soleids), eels, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 13.vi.1988.

Sta. MAU.131 Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin, 20°29'N 17°41'W, depth 225-235 m, mainly scorpenids, some Palinurus, tubeworms, holothurians, Pinna shells,small macrourids some flatfisch, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 20.vi.1988.
Sta. MAU.042 Off Mauritania, 18°03'N 16°58'W, depth 820-990 m, muddy bottom, macrourids and eel-shaped fishes, octopids, ophiuroids crabs, red shrimp, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 10.vi.1988.
Sta. MAU.019 Off Mauritania, 18°50'N 16°23'W, depth 30 m, sandy bottom with sponges, hermitcrabs, many small flatfish (soleids), 1.2 m Agassiz trawl, 8.vi.1988.

Sta. MAU.142 Mauritania, off Cap Blanc, 20°39'N 17°36'W, depth 75-100 m, gastropods (Xenophora), Munida, shrimp (Plesionika heterocarpus), flatfish, Capros, Octopus, hermitcrabs, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 21.vi.1988.

Sta. MAU.060 Off Mauritania, 19°06'N 16°46'W, depth 280-350 m, rather steep continental slope, many irregular sea-urchins, various fish (scorpaenids dominating), crabs, shrimp, Palinurus, 2.4 m Agassiz trawl, 12.vi.1988.
Sta. MAU.066 Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin, 20°00'N 17°11'W, depth 25 m, muddy sand with Cardium and Lanice, Portunidae, flatfish (soleids), Cymbium, Luidia, 3.5 m Agassiz trawl, 13.vi.1988.
